trans-unit.source: BLAKE2 is a cryptographic hash function, which offers highest security while being as fast as MD5 or SHA-1, and comes in two flavors:
trans-unit.target: BLAKE2是一种加密哈希函数,它提供了最高的安全性,同时与MD5或SHA-1一样快,有两种口味。

trans-unit.source: BLAKE2 supports keyed mode (a faster and simpler replacement for HMAC), salted hashing, personalization, and tree hashing.
trans-unit.target: BLAKE2支持键控模式(更快、更简单地替代HMAC)、盐渍哈希、个性化和树状哈希。

trans-unit.source: BLAKE2b, optimized for 64-bit platforms and produces digests of any size between 1 and 64 bytes,
trans-unit.target: BLAKE2b,针对64位平台进行了优化,产生的摘要大小在1到64字节之间。

trans-unit.source: BLAKE2s, optimized for 8- to 32-bit platforms and produces digests of any size between 1 and 32 bytes.
trans-unit.target: BLAKE2s,针对8位到32位平台进行了优化,可以产生1到32字节之间任意大小的摘要。

trans-unit.source: Hash objects from this module follow the API of standard library’s
trans-unit.target: 该模块中的哈希对象遵循标准库的API

trans-unit.source: pyblake2 is an extension module for Python implementing BLAKE2 hash function.
trans-unit.target: pyblake2是Python实现BLAKE2哈希函数的扩展模块。
